title: faq: update to reference stability of Go1
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Go to http://golang.org/doc/go_faq.html

What is the expected output?
FAQ needs some entries relating to the development process of Go1 and Go2. Questions
like "I have a great idea for a new language feature" can be answered by
reference to the stability goal of Go1 and that Go2 is perhaps some years away.
